name: EscapeZ
description:
Play as yourself choose the correct path to escape prison and avoid the alien-Hybrid officers and such.  Warning! Some choices will not be obvious choose carefully. There are 3 different scenarios that allow you to win and many that allow you to end up in prison.  A short visual-novel game I made for fun and laughs. Please be kind with your comments as this particular game will be funny to those that have had to deal with similar situations. I spent a lot of time on this despite that the story is short. Playtime for this game is about 30 minutes more or less.

Disclaimer: There is some blood and suggestions of violence please be warned this game is for adults and those that have permission to play such games. 

Please donate if you would like to see more unique & interesting visual-novels thank you.
